meanings.definition: amidases: enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of amides
meanings.sent1: The amidases in our bodies help break down certain substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study amidases to understand how they work in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The amidases at the laboratory party were the life of the event, breaking down jokes and making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of amidases, breaking down obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The amidases in nature are like tiny workers, tirelessly breaking down molecules to keep the cycle going.
